definitions.definition: To force a person to the ground with the weight of one's own body, usually by jumping on top or slamming one's weight into them.
To face or deal with , attempting to overcome or fight down .
examples: The government's measures to tackle crime were insufficient.

definitions.definition: To attempt to take away a ball.
To bring a ball carrier to the ground.
To " hit on " or pursue a person that one is interested in.

main_definition: To force a person to the ground with the weight of one's own body, usually by jumping on top or slamming one's weight into them.
secondary_definitions: To face or deal with , attempting to overcome or fight down .
( sports ) To attempt to take away a ball.
( rugby , American football ) To bring a ball carrier to the ground.
( Singapore , colloquial ) To " hit on " or pursue a person that one is interested in.
